Class MouseMazeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.kzoo.grid.gui.SteppedGridAppController
      • MouseMazeController
  • public class MouseMazeController
extends edu.kzoo.grid.gui.SteppedGridAppController
    A MouseMazeController object handles the starting, stepping, and stopping operations initiated by the user using the GUI fir the mouse-in-a-maze application.
    Version:
    Feb 29, 2004
    Author:
    Alyce Brady
